seller_description: Product details: Sole material: Ethylene Vinyl Acetate, Platform height: 1.38 inches, Outer material: Corduroy, Closure type: Pull-On. About this item: Sizing Guide these slippers are elegantly shaped to adorn the line of your feet. Please measure your foot length before purchasing. US 5-6(foot length:9.45 inches/24cm); US 7-8(foot length:9.84 inches/25cm); US 9-10(foot length:10.24 inches/26cm); US 11-12(foot length:10.63 inches/27cm). If you are 6.5/8.5/10.5, or if you have narrow feet or low insteps, please choose slippers one size down. Chantomoo Original Appearance Patented Slippers The corduroy fabric of these slippers is fine and soft, skin friendly, warm, and non-slip underfoot. Corduroy fabric is combined with bowknot elements to make cross band slippers. The design is unique, classic and simple, with retro and elegant temperament, bright and stylish colors, suitable for all ages and all clothes. The memory foam slippers relax the feet, the platform is supported and not collapsed, and the EVA sole is wear-resistant and non-slip. At the same time, these materials make it very light, like walking on the cloud. These slippers are suitable for all scenes, indoor, bedroom, shopping, walking, party, travel, wedding, etc. Packaged in a unique and adorable shoebox, it makes the perfect slipper gift. Open toe slippers are breathable, lightweight, quiet, suitable for all seasons, perfect house slippers. Easy care, machine wash or hand wash, air dry, do not bleach.
review: I needed some easy to slip on house shoes. These are cute, comfortable and affordable! I love the color- I chose the lilac ( light purple) true to size. I'm a 7.5-8 so I chose the 7-8 and they are a great fit. Also,These would make a good gift!
expected-output: Seller's Description and Image: The seller describes the product as open-toe corduroy slippers with a memory foam platform, designed to provide comfort and support. They emphasize the soft, skin-friendly corduroy fabric, the bowknot design, and EVA sole for non-slip durability. The platform height is listed as 1.38 inches, and the closure type is a pull-on. The image provided by the seller showcases the slippers as soft, plush, and well-crafted with attention to detail. Buyer's Image and Review: The buyer’s image of the lilac-colored slippers closely matches the seller’s image in terms of design, shape, and overall appearance. The buyer's review confirms that the slippers are comfortable, easy to slip on, and fit well, true to the suggested sizing. The buyer also appreciates the aesthetics, mentioning they’re cute, affordable, and suitable for a house slipper. Conclusion: The buyer is satisfied with the product, expressing that it meets their expectations in comfort, appearance, and value. There are no discrepancies between the seller's promises and the buyer’s experience. The buyer's feedback aligns positively with the seller's description, suggesting that the product is accurately represented. " Neither the buyer nor the seller is at fault; the product meets the seller's description in terms of comfort, appearance, and value. The buyer is satisfied, indicating an accurate representation and a successful purchase that aligns well with expectations.
